apiProducts.label: Accounts
apiProducts.description: The ALPHA WEB Banking Account, Payment and Funds Confirmation APIs are PSD2 Compliant APIs providing information about the accounts (products) of a WEB Banking subscriber of the Alpha Bank, as well as payment initiation functionality. Both account information and lists of transactions can be acquired, along with direct-debits, standing orders, etc.
